data_structure.description: Comprehensive Russian profanity database including mat system with Cyrillic and Latin script variations

entry_format.word: The profane word or phrase in Cyrillic script
entry_format.variations: Common variations and obfuscations in both scripts
entry_format.target_type: Whether it targets individuals, groups, or is general
entry_format.mat_classification: Traditional mat system classification if applicable
